channel.title: [PI] how do i change
channel.description: Hey, how do i change the information on quest tab, what file. I've tried to search the server's name but no results

item.title: [PI] how do i change

i mean how do i change the servers name on quest tab

item.title: [PI] how do i change
item.dc:creator: @tylarotheog tylarotheog
item.description:
@tylarotheog wrote:

its in the server folder, client.java you want to add things under public void update() {
and for mine so far i use this code [code] public void update() {
getPA().sendFrame126(“Players Online: “+PlayerHandler.getPlayerCount()+ " “, 640); //quest journal title
getPA().sendFrame126(“Player Statistics”, 663); //quest title
getPA().sendFrame126(”@or1@PC Points: @gre@”+pcPoints+” “, 7332); //quest title
getPA().sendFrame126(”@or1@RW Points: @gre@"+magePoints+" “, 7333); //quest title
getPA().sendFrame126(”@or1@Slayer Task: @gre@"+Server.npcHandler.getNpcListName(slayerTask)+" “, 7334); //quest title
getPA().sendFrame126(”@or1@Amount Remaining: @gre@"+taskAmount+" “, 7336); //quest title
getPA().sendFrame126(”@gre@Donor Island Teleport", 7341); //quest title
getPA().sendFrame126(" “, 7346); //quest title
getPA().sendFrame126(” ", 7340); //quest title

	synchronized (this) {
		handler.updatePlayer(this, outStream);
		handler.updateNPC(this, outStream);
		flushOutStream();
	}
}[/code]

colours that look nice are orange @or1@ salmon @lre@

Read full topic
